1: Save me, O God, For the waters have [b]threatened my life.

5: O God, it is You who knows my folly, And my wrongs are not hidden from You.
6: May those who wait for You not be ashamed through me, O Lord [e]God of hosts; May those who seek You not be dishonored through me, O God of Israel,

12: Those who sit in the gate talk about me, And I am the [g]song of the drunkards.

17: And do not hide Your face from Your servant, For I am in distress; answer me quickly.
18: Oh draw near to my soul and redeem it; Ransom me because of my enemies!
19: You know my reproach and my shame and my dishonor; All my adversaries are [l]before You.
